name: switch
description: Switch between your favourite apps lightning fast (Windows, MacOS)

scripts.build-win32: tsc  && pkg . --output bin/switch --targets node10-win-x64  && node post-build.js
scripts.build-darwin: tsc  && pkg . --output bin/switch --targets node10-macos-x64  && node post-build.js
scripts.build-linux: tsc  && pkg . --output bin/switch --targets node10-linux-x64  && node post-build.js

author: Victor Aremu
